column1: Baby Barnaby's////This is my boyfriend and I's go-to weekend breakfast spot. We always wait extra for a table outside because the inside is far too loud and always share the same dish: the low-fat protein burrito but made with fat (we add cheese and potatoes). Most importantly the waiters do not hesitate to bring us an extra order of the sides (guac
column3: sour cream). This is a key to our relationship as we have nearly broken up over condiment sharing issues.
